div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2087 Sicily, 1965 Burial: c. 4.30 B.C. (K) Contents: c. 240? AR Acragas: 3+ tetradr. Gela: 6+ tetradr. (incl. Jenkins Grp. VI) Leontini: 1 + tetradr. Messana: 4+ tetradr. Syracuse: 65+ tetradr. (to Boehringer 534, fdc) Disposition: dispersed Seen in commerce, 1965 (number listed above estimated as about one third of total hd.) The date of burial is that of Jenkins for the beginning of his Grp. VI; the fdc specimens of Syracuse, however, are at least a decade earlier
